author: bob_wilkinson
post: I just read Heaven is for Real. Wow, what an inspiration. I made a copy of the photo of Jesus and have it on my desk and when I look into those eyes I feel complete peace. For those who doubt I feel sorry and for those who believe…..I will see you when we all get to Heaven and can stand in the presence of our Savior and his Father. I am going to buy 10 of the books and pass them around to friends to read..
title: Akiane’s Jesus, Heaven is for Real and the Man in the Turin Shroud
